VA decision reviews and appeals
The legacy VA appeals process has changed to the decision review process. If you disagree with a VA benefit or claim decision, you can choose from 3 decision review options (Supplemental Claim, Higher-Level Review, or Board Appeal) to continue your case. If you aren’t satisfied with the results of the first option you choose, you can try another eligible option. If you disagree with a VA medical decision, you can request a Clinical Appeal.

You can file a Clinical Appeal to request a review of a decision that your VA care team made about your treatment or care.
